sentences.en: A patchwork quilt is a good way of using up scraps of material.
sentences.cn: 做杂拼花布棉被是利用零碎布料的好办法.

sentences.en: Bio 2, after all, was a patchwork wilderness par excellence.
sentences.cn: 毕竟, 生物圈二号是东拼西凑出类拔萃的荒野.

sentences.en: Even the old patchwork quilt is the same!
sentences.cn: 甚至这条旧的百衲被罩也是一样!

sentences.en: Exquisite exquisite architectural design high and low around the patchwork, imaginative.
sentences.cn: 建筑设计玲珑精巧,高低前后错落有致, 匠心独运.

sentences.en: For centuries, quilting and patchwork have been popular needlecrafts.
sentences.cn: 几个世纪以来，缝被子和做布拼一直是许多人都会做的针线活儿。

sentences.en: For we know that our patchwork heritage a strength, a weakness.
sentences.cn: 因为我们知道,我们融合得来的遗产是种力量, 不是缺点.

sentences.en: He patched new cloth to the old coat until It'seemed mere patchwork.
sentences.cn: 他将新布补缀在旧大衣上,直到这件大衣看起来像拼凑之物.

sentences.en: If Generation XMl document, or your own patchwork string it.
sentences.cn: 如果需要生成XMl文档, 还是自己拼凑字串吧.

sentences.en: Modern teaching buildings and Villas ancient buildings patchwork exist side by side.
sentences.cn: 现代化的教学楼与山庄古建筑错落有致,相映成趣.

sentences.en: Mr. Cruncher reposed under a patchwork counterpane, like a Harlequin at home.
sentences.cn: 克朗彻先生盖了一床白衲衣图案的花哨被子, 像是呆在家里的丑角.

sentences.en: She patched new cloth to the old coat, so It'seemed mere patchwork.
sentences.cn: 她把新布初到那件旧上衣上, 所以那件衣服看上去就象拼凑起来的东西.

sentences.en: The fields looked like a patchwork of different colours.
sentences.cn: 田野呈现出浓淡不一的色调.

sentences.en: The low mountains were a patchwork of green and brown.
sentences.cn: 低矮的群山上，绿色和棕色混杂着。

sentences.en: There are several patchwork cushions to choose from.
sentences.cn: 有好几种拼布工艺靠垫可供选择。

sentences.en: This is not plagiarism but just a patchwork of quotations.
sentences.cn: 这不是剽窃,这只是拼凑出来的.

phrases.tran_cn: 拼布床单；用小块布缝缀的被罩

trans.tran_en: a type of sewing in which many coloured squares of cloth are stitched together to make one large piece
